unnormalised: New Delhi: The timing for the upcoming G20 summit in Delhi has raised questions regarding the experience for international visitors. The primary events scheduled for 09/09/2024 and 10/09/2024 will strictly adhere to IST (Indian Standard Time).
normalised: New Delhi: The timing for the upcoming G twenty summit in Delhi has raised questions regarding the experience for international visitors. The primary events scheduled for ninth september two thousand and twenty four and tenth september two thousand and twenty four will strictly adhere to I-S-T (Indian Standard Time).

unnormalised: Delegates arriving from the United States should note the significant time difference. New York, operating on EDT, is 9 hrs and 30 mins behind IST. Los Angeles, on PST, lags by a substantial 12 hrs and 30 mins. Adjustments to sleep schedules are advised to mitigate potential jet lag, ensuring optimal participation in meetings and discussions.
normalised: Delegates arriving from the United States should note the significant time difference. New York, operating on E-D-T, is nine hours and thirty minutes behind I-S-T. Los Angeles, on P-S-T, lags by a substantial twelve hours and thirty minutes. Adjustments to sleep schedules are advised to mitigate potential jet lag, ensuring optimal participation in meetings and discussions.

unnormalised: European attendees, particularly those coming from London (BST), will experience a 4 hr and 30 mins difference. For delegates travelling from Berlin (CEST), the time difference amounts to 3 hrs and 30 mins. The Ministry of External Affairs has issued guidance on managing travel fatigue and adjusting to the local time zone.
normalised: European attendees, particularly those coming from London (B-S-T), will experience a four hour and thirty minutes difference. For delegates travelling from Berlin (C-E-S-T), the time difference amounts to three hours and thirty minutes. The Ministry of External Affairs has issued guidance on managing travel fatigue and adjusting to the local time zone.

unnormalised: Businesses operating internationally are also urged to take note of the time differences for coordinating communications and meetings. All official events will be communicated in IST. Delegates are advised to set their devices to IST.
normalised: Businesses operating internationally are also urged to take note of the time differences for coordinating communications and meetings. All official events will be communicated in I-S-T. Delegates are advised to set their devices to I-S-T.
